document.docAuthor: Shakhovskoy, Ilia B. & Parin, Nikolay V.
document.docTitle: Cheilopogon formosus subsp. pseudospilopterus Shakhovskoy & Parin 2019
document.masterDocTitle: A review of the flying fish genus Cypselurus (Beloniformes: Exocoetidae). Part 1. Revision of the subgenus Zonocypselurus Parin and Bogorodsky, 2011 with descriptions of one new subgenus, four new species and two new subspecies and reinstatement of one species as valid

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the flying fish genus Cypselurus (Beloniformes: Exocoetidae). Part 1. Revision of the subgenus Zonocypselurus Parin and Bogorodsky, 2011 with descriptions of one new subgenus, four new species and two new subspecies and reinstatement of one species as valid
